comprehensive overview: JupyterLab is an interactive development environment provided by Project Jupyter. It offers a flexible and extensible platform for working with Jupyter notebooks, code, and data. JupyterLab supports multiple programming languages, interactive visualizations, and various tools for data exploration.
core features: Interactive development environment for Jupyter notebooks
Flexible platform for data science, visualization, and code editing
Integration with Jupyter notebooks, text files, terminals, and custom components
